only.group: 👩‍👩‍👦‍👦 ```This command can only be used in groups!```
only.ownerG: 💎 ```This command can only be used by the group owner!```
only.ownerB: 🎩 ```This command can only be used by the bot owner!```
only.modB: 👮 ```This command can only be used by the bot moderators!```
only.admin: 🛡️ ```This command can only be used by the admins!```
only.Badmin: 🤖 ```This command can only be used when the bot is admin!```

initialSetup:
🤖 *AKM WHATSAPP BOT Integrated Successfully!* 
 
 ❗*Here are the few commands only you can run to manage the bot-*
👨‍👨‍👧‍👦*dgl* : ```Change daily user limit```

👦*dul* : ```Change daily group limit```
👨‍👨‍👧‍👦*mgs* : ```Change the minimum participants required for bot to work in group```
🕛*rst* : ```Reset the daily group and user credit back to 0```
💾*sql* : ```Perform sql command on the bot databse```
👮‍♀️*mdr* : ```Add a user as a bot moderator```
❎*rmdr*: ```Remove a user as a bot moderator```
🟢*rtrt*: ```Restart the bot server```
🔴*stp* : ```Shutdown the bot```
